pacing.description: Measured, deliberate pacing that conveys precision and expertise

transitions.tertiary: Wipe (left to right for data reveals)
transitions.philosophy: Clean and minimal - respect the viewer's cognitive load

lower_thirds.animation: Fade in from bottom, hold 3-5 seconds, fade out
lower_thirds.background: Semi-transparent dark bar with accent border

ai_analysis_display.animation: Scan lines from top, reveal data progressively

confidence_metrics.animation: Fill from left to right over 2-3 seconds

data_visualization.colors: Cyan, teal, white on dark backgrounds

callout_text.animation: Fade in with subtle scale (1.0x to 1.05x)

sonic_logo.description: A 3-second audio signature representing VUNO's AI intelligence and medical precision

composition.opening: Clean, ascending electronic tone starting at 440Hz (A4), rising to 880Hz (A5) over 0.5 seconds
composition.middle: Harmonic resonance with synthesized heartbeat (72 BPM) pulsing underneath
composition.closing: Resolved with a single, confident tone that fades gracefully

sonic_logo.usage: Logo reveal, product launch moments, section breaks

music_style.mood_progression: Calm opening → Subtle buildup → Confident resolution

use_cases.product_demo: Ambient tech with light electronic elements (volume: -18dB to -12dB)
use_cases.investor_presentation: More dynamic with subtle crescendos at key moments

music_style.reference_artists: Tycho, Ólafur Arnalds, Nils Frahm (electronic/ambient style)

ai_processing.scanning_sound: Subtle ascending chirp (0.5s duration, rising sine wave from 200Hz to 800Hz)
ai_processing.processing_sound: Soft pulsing tone with slight granular texture (repeating every 0.3s)
ai_processing.analysis_complete: Clean, confident 'ding' sound at 880Hz, slightly bell-like

ui_interactions.button_click: Soft electronic click (100-150ms, bright tone at 600Hz)
ui_interactions.error_tone: Brief, non-alarming alert at lower frequency (400Hz, 200ms)

medical_interface.scan_initiation: Ascending tone sequence representing system activation
medical_interface.result_ready: Gentle bell tone followed by subtle confirmation sound
medical_interface.alert_notification: Professional, non-jarring alert (avoid medical alarm sounds)

9_16_social.content_adaptation: Vertical layout with centered key elements, readable on mobile

thumbnail_style.design_philosophy: Professional medical imagery with clean, readable text

imagery.medical_focus: AI-enhanced medical images (CT, MRI, X-ray) with clear labeling
imagery.backgrounds: Blurred medical imaging with VUNO brand color overlay (15-25% opacity)
imagery.subject: Clear, uncluttered with focus on key diagnostic element

headline.content: Clear, benefit-driven (e.g., 'AI Diagnostic Accuracy', 'Patient Data Security')

branding_element.logo_placement: Top right or bottom right, 10-15% of thumbnail size
branding_element.accent_color: Cyan border or icon indicator of key theme

composition.contrast: High (ensure text legibility at small sizes)
composition.clutter: Avoid - medical professionalism requires clean design

accessibility.standard: Closed captions (CC) in SRT or VTT format
accessibility.coverage: 100% of dialogue, significant sound effects, music cues

formatting.font: Sans-serif (Arial, Verdana, or system fonts for web)
formatting.color: White with black outline (2-3px) for contrast
formatting.positioning: Bottom 20% of frame, centered or left-aligned

professional_standards.speaker_identification: Bold name before dialogue (e.g., 'DOCTOR SMITH: Results show...')
professional_standards.medical_terminology: Spell out abbreviations on first use (e.g., 'CT scan' before 'CT')

line_breaks.reading_time: Minimum 3 seconds per caption (180ms per character)

medical_content_specific.patient_data: Never display real PHI (Protected Health Information) - use placeholder/de-identified data
medical_content_specific.technical_terms: Define in context (e.g., 'sensitivity' is detection rate, not emotional sensitivity)
medical_content_specific.results_readout: Present clearly and separately from explanatory text

hipaa_compliance.patient_privacy: All patient data must be de-identified or use stock medical imagery
hipaa_compliance.no_real_phi: Never show real patient names, MRNs, dates of birth, medical record numbers
hipaa_compliance.consent: If using patient likeness, obtain informed written consent
hipaa_compliance.data_handling: Demonstrate secure data transmission/encryption when applicable

regulatory_standards.fda_claims: Ensure any clinical claims are substantiated and compliant with FDA guidance
regulatory_standards.disclaimer: Include disclaimer if making diagnostic or treatment claims
regulatory_standards.research_citations: Reference peer-reviewed studies when making clinical claims

scanning_process.animation: Progressive scan lines moving across medical image (top to bottom)
scanning_process.color_scheme: Cyan scan lines on original medical image

ai_detection_display.bounding_boxes: Glowing cyan rectangles around detected areas
ai_detection_display.confidence_scores: Display percentage with smooth numerical animation
ai_detection_display.heatmaps: Color-coded intensity maps (cyan = high confidence, blue = moderate)

comparison_view.emphasis: Highlight key differences with subtle animation

timeline_integration.historical_data: Show multiple scans/results over time progression

display_standards.anonymization: Replace names with 'Patient #' or generic identifiers
display_standards.age_only: If including demographics, use age range not exact date of birth
display_standards.medical_history: Show relevant clinical context without identifying details
display_standards.location: Generic 'Regional Hospital' or institution name, not specific location

consent_demonstration.workflow_steps: Show how patients grant consent for AI analysis
consent_demonstration.transparency: Demonstrate what data is collected, used, and stored
consent_demonstration.security_measures: Visual representation of encryption, access controls

result_communication.patient_communication: Demonstrate how results are communicated to patient
result_communication.next_steps: Show recommended follow-up actions or treatment planning

medical_images.sources: Use licensed stock medical imagery or owned/consented patient data
medical_images.authenticity: Real medical images (not AI-generated for demo purposes, unless clearly labeled)
medical_images.variety: Show diverse modalities (CT, MRI, X-ray, ultrasound) as relevant

clinical_accuracy.context: Provide clinical context for findings shown

ethics.representation: Include diverse patient demographics in imagery
ethics.educational: Ensure clinical content serves educational purpose

integration_points.ehr_integration: How results integrate with patient electronic health records

video_codec.delivery: H.264 MP4 or H.265 HEVC (for web delivery)

audio_codec.delivery: AAC 128-256 kbps (stereo), Dolby Digital if available

color_space.delivery: sRGB for web, Rec.2020 for broadcast

pre_delivery: Color grading consistent across all scenes
No PHI visible in final output
Sonic logo and UI sounds properly implemented
Text legible on all delivery formats (16:9, 9:16, 1:1)

youtube: Subtitles in English and additional languages
